General.Name: Baotailong New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Baotailong New Materials Co., Ltd. provides new material, coal-based clean energy, advanced carbon material, coal chemical, and other products in China. It offers coke, fine coal, coal tar, ammonium sulfate, liquid oxygen and nitrogen, crude benzene, methanol, refined washing oil, asphalt blending components, needle coke, and graphene. In addition, the company is involved in power and heat supply activities. The company was formerly known as Qitaihe Baotailong Coal & Coal Chemicals Public Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baotailong New Materials Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Baotailong New Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Qitaihe, China.

4.Name: Mr. Weizhou  Wang
4.Title: VP, Sec., Director & Supervisory Board Member
